short_description: 2 tickets to see Taylor Swift at Wembley Stadium
description: 2 excellent seated tickets to see Taylor Swift at Wembley Stadium, for the show of your choice in August! Lot 1 of 2 for this prize, 2 tickets per lot.

short_description: Another 2 tickets to see Taylor Swift at Wembley Stadium!
description: 2 excellent seated tickets to see Taylor Swift at Wembley Stadium, for the show of your choice in August! Lot 2 of 2 for this prize, 2 tickets per lot.

short_description: An Albion shirt signed by the Women's team
description: Brighton & Hove Albion WFC signed football shirt.

short_description: A brilliant new gift voucher that helps independent local businesses flourish in Brighton & Hove
description: Goodmoney gift vouchers can be spent with a wide range of local businesses. They offer more choice, support local and make you feel good.

short_description: Grab a bargain Popeyes Louisiana Chicken meal for the whole family with a £30 gift card
description: Grab a bargain Popeyes Louisiana Chicken meal for the whole family with a £30 gift card. Valid in any Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen across the country. Valid until 31/12/2024.

lot: Bespoke Guided Walk in Brighton and Hove
short_description: A guided walk by Dr Geoffrey Mead, local historian, of anywhere in Brighton & Hove
description: A guided walk by Dr Geoffrey Mead, local historian, of anywhere in Brighton & Hove. You can choose where and when and for any number of people and Dr Geoffrey Mead will teach you all about wherever you choose. No doubt wherever will be full of interesting facts you can share with your friends!
